ewani sithiwillak pahala wimata mageth kalayak thisse wardhanaya wu yam manasikathwayak balapannata atha.namuth eya kumakdayi me kathawata wadagath nathi bawin noliyami.namuth eya hudu sithuwillak nowa.sabawinma eya iwaki.mata athi wuye wadath prabala iwak bawa mata pasak wuye apage usas pela prathipala labi pasalata giya awasthawediya.aththa washayenma aya wanija anshayen disthrikkaye prathama sthanaya laba gena atha.meya wiya hakida?thaman kisidaka kathabaha kara nathi handinagena nathi hudu janapriya charithayak wima nisa as manaye darshanaya wu kenek gana mewani anagatha wakyayak athi wimath,eya elesama saba wimath.namuth ma eya ee mohothe therum ganimata uthsaha nokalada me siduwima thawath wasara hayak gathawanathuruth sithe konaka thanpath wi thibuni.

indiya sagara samuluwata sahabhagi wima sandaha singappuruwata gos sitina shri lanka agramathya ranil wikramasinha mahatha hamuwimata pamini amerikanu rajya departhamenthuwe dakunu saha madhyama aasiyanu katayuthu bhara sahakara rajya lekam nisha biswal warthamana deshapalana, samajayiya saha aarthika prawanatha pilibandawa sakachcha pawathwuwa ya.02 wana da singappuruwe rits kaltan hotalaye pawathi mema sakachchawanhi di shri lankawe wathman sanwardhana kriyadamaya saha aasiyanu kalapiya ratawala deshapalana abhiyogayan sambandhawa da awadhanaya yomu kerini.mahanuwara, kolambaa, hambanthota aarthika koridoraye sanwardhana salasum saha nagenahira palathe thrikunamalaya aashritha sanwardhana karyayan pilibandawa karunu pahadili kerunu athara, yuddhayen barapathala pidawanta lakwu uthuru palathe jana jiwithaya yali samanya thathwayata path karalima sandaha kriyathmaka kala yuthu dirgha kalina thirasara wada piliwela sambandhayen da dirgha lesa sakachcha kerini.shri lankawe sammuthiwadi rajaya genayanu labana yahapalana wada piliwela pilibandawa prasadaya pala kala biswal mahathmiya, shri lankeya janathawage yahapatha saha abhiwruddhiya wenuwen sahaya laba dimata sudanamin sitina bawa da awadharanaya kala ya.
